ygData.messageBody:
The problem with the HT idea is exactly as you stated.
When i use HT, i want the damage to be NOW.
We have no DD spells to speak of (Disease Cloud..our
only one..5DMG..sweet) so taking that one aspect from
the HT would indeed be a negative , IMO of course.

And to be honest..there is NO WAY im unequipting my
weapon during battle. The main reason is lag. When you
are moviing your pointer around trying to put the
weapon back in its spot, lag can all too easily make
you miss the slot. And there for either pput it in a
trade window for another player. That 1. screws them
up. 2. at the least forces you to hit cancel, reopen
inventory, and then try again. Meanwhile you are
punching for 2, 1, miss, miss, miss, etc. And thats if
you are even facing the battle anymore.

Or at the very worst, you miss the slot target and it
drops to the ground. That can get VERY messy.

Now that sound like i went a little overboard, but
even if most dont see eye to eye with my specific
reasons, i think it will still be the general
consensus that hand-to-hand spell is not desired.
There was rumor at first that thats how you activated
Vamp Embrace before they changed it. There were a
whole lot of unhappy SKs with that idea.

Now dont get all weepy because i didnt agree with your
ideas. I post many that people dont agree with too.
I just like that you are thinking about the class and
ways that it may be improved.

But i will say that you see things differently once
you have more levels under your belt. I came up with
some ideas when i first started that wouldnt have
worked either.


I still hold firmly to my idea that HT should have a
LifeDrain effect added to it.
So if your HT does 14DMG , like mine did at level 39,
then you get that 14 drained into you.
My point with that VERY real illustration is that it
will not be too powerful because it will stll have the
same obsurd resist rate.
So its not doing more damage so all the wizards can
stop shaking in their slippers thinking that we can
now steal kills from them. But at the same time add a
very useful function that we deserately need.
(i know they are testing Drains on test server, but a
45 max one will only be so useful).

Anyway..i only have an hoour and a half til
work..gotts play, since the serverwide take downs last
night robbed me

Bathory D'Allatu

--- phreddy@... wrote:
> granted i am only lvl 11, so these ideas might be
> really bad at high levels.
>
> i was thinking about Brian's comment about why they
> won't change the resist rate on HT. if 6 sks used
> HT all at once, that would be a lot of damage done
> to a mob, especially if it was a rare spawn. what
> if HT was changed from dd to dot? the total damage
> could be upped to 15 or 20 * lvl, and it could do
> 5*lvl dd, then the rest could be dot over 1-2
> minutes. the resist rate could be lowered, and
> damage would be increased. the only problem that i
> see is it would be less useful in emergency
> situations, because it would not do as much damage
> right away, and so could not kill a mob as quickly
> if you are about to die. do people think this would
> be an improvement or a nerf?
>
> my other idea would be to create an sk only spell,
> that is like vampiric embrace. it would be hand
> damage only, so no weapon. it would be much harder
> or impossible to resist the damage, but each hit
> would take mana. this way it could only be used for
> a little bit of time, like 1-3 min., before oom.
> would people find that useful?
